repository.corpname: Department of Special Collections and University Archives

did.unittitle: Stanford "From the Foot-Hills to the Bay," Photograph Album
did.physloc: Special Collections and University Archives materials are stored offsite and must be paged 48 hours in advance. For more information on paging collections, see the department's website: http://library.stanford.edu/spc.

scopecontent.head: Content Description
scopecontent.p: Stanford "From the Foot-hills to the Bay" viewbook by Robinson & Crandall, 1915.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research use; materials must be requested at least 48 hours in advance of intended use. Audio-visual materials are not available in original format, and must be reformatted to a digital use copy.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: All requests to reproduce, publish, quote from, or otherwise use collection materials must be submitted in writing to the Head of Special Collections and University Archives, Stanford University Libraries, Stanford, California 94304-6064. Consent is given on behalf of Special Collections as the owner of the physical items and is not intended to include or imply permission from the copyright owner. Such permission must be obtained from the copyright owner, heir(s) or assigns. Restrictions also apply to digital representations of the original materials. Use of digital files is restricted to research and educational purposes.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Stanford "From the Foot-Hills to the Bay," Photograph Album (A0133). Dept. of Special Collections and University Archives, Stanford University Libraries, Stanford, Calif.
